nodes.text: A Zygerrian female cultist ally operated for the Frangawl Cult on the moon Zardossa Stix. After the Frangawl Cult kidnapped Queen Julia of Bardotta and took her to Zardossa Stix to be sacrificed, the Zygerrian was present alongside several other cultists as the kidnappers arrived, carrying a tooka with her. The Jedi Master Mace Windu and Representative Jar Jar Binks visited Zardossa Stix to rescue the queen, locating her kidnappers in a market square. As the cultists escaped, the Zygerrian released her tooka into a herd of eopie, slowing Windu's pursuit.
